Posted By: DB
For sale are 4 Hassan Triple Folders 2 graded by PSA and 2 in the raw.

First is WM. Dahlen and W. D. Scanlan - Hartzell Covering Third is in the raw with great eye appeal. 

Second card is John T. Meyers and Otis Crandall - Just before the Battle also in raw form with a crease through the center of the picture vertically

Third up is PSA VG-EX 4 Mathewson and Meyers - Just Before the Battle #02288794 

Finally PSA EX 5 F. Chance and J. Evers - Evers makes a Safe Slide #02288793

Please email me at kilaartist@aol.com for scans of the cards and to make offers. Thanks

DB
